column4: One quick question. Is http://wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats still the 'bible' (if I might say so) for enabling all media playback and other proprietary software on Dapper?
Pretty much, there might be edits soon due to Dapper.
that was what I was afraid of. What is the best 'automated' solution for Dapper? Easy Ubuntu, Automatix, or some other project? I want literally everything, without any hassles :)
